items.sentence: It's unclear why Tom had stopped doing that.
There's no chance Tom will agree to do that.
I didn't think we were ready to do that yet.
Don't you think that you're bigger than Tom?
My father gives my mother all of his salary.
There's a little hope that Tom will succeed.
Dinner finished, they enjoyed playing cards.
The children were singing and holding hands.
Nothing you do will keep me from doing that.
Tom doesn't know how to brush his teeth yet.
The sweet potato is native to South America.
Is it true that Tom tried to poison himself?
You're really good at writing short stories.
It's been a long time since I've worn a tie.
I thought we would be more comfortable here.
It's hard to relax when you have a headache.
I see no reason to continue this discussion.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was insane.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been losing weight.
The police had their reasons to suspect Tom.
